column4: description
Full title by which the Dataset is known.
The person(s), corporate body(ies), or agency(ies) responsible for creating the work.
Enter the author's Family Name, Given Name, or the name of the organization responsible for this dataset.
The organization with which the author is affiliated.
The e-mail address(es) of the contact(s) for the Dataset.
A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset.
Free-form text that describe important aspects of the Dataset.
Select any domain-specific Subject(s) that are relevant to the Dataset.
Additional important information about the Dataset
Another unique identifier that identifies this dataset (e.g., producer's or archive's number).
Other identifier that corresponds to this Dataset.
Name of agency which generated this identifier.
Publications that use the data from this Dataset.
Provide the full bibliographic citation for this related publication.
The type of digital identifier used for this publication (e.g., Digital Object Identifier (DOI)).
The actual identifier for the selected ID type.
Link to the publication web page (in the journal site, archive site or other).
The institution or person  responsible for collecting,  managing, distributing, or  otherwise contributing to the  development of the resource.
The type of contributor of the  resource.
The name of the contributor.
If applicable, the organization with which the contributor is affiliated.
If applicable, the abbreviation by which the contributor is commonly known. (ex. IQSS, ICPSR)
This URL points to the conributor's web presence, if appropriate. Enter an absolute URL where the contributor's web site is found, e.g., http://www.my.org.
If applicable, the logo url that points to this contributor's web accessible logo image. Enter an absolute URL where the contributor's logo image is found, e.g., http://www.my.org/images/logo.gif.
Date when the data collection/other material(s) were produced (not distributed, released or archived).
The location where the data collection and any other related materials were produced.
Grant Information
The grant or contract number of the project that  sponsored the effort.
Grant Number Agency
Name of a person (or organization) who provided this Dataset to the archive originally storing the data.
Date that the Dataset was deposited into the repository.
Any material related to this Dataset.
Any Datasets that are relevant to this one, such as prior  research on this subject.
Any references that would serve as background or  supporting material to this Dataset.
List of books, articles, serials, or machine-readable  data files, if any, that served as the sources of the data  collection.
